title: How much storage space does the current league of legends take up?

replies.body: As per the [Minimum Requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements#wq1), you'll want to have at least 8GB available for League. The suggested space to leave for League long-term is 12GB (for logs, screenshots and such), but 8GB of disk space will be enough in most cases.

5.65 gb, by the looks of it.

After that it's really only as big as your computer is. :^)
